document.discussion_title: Boy & Bear coming to Orange in December | Central Western Daily
document.topic_text: 12 Aug 2016, 12:56 p.m. Boy & Bear have announced a massive tour around regional Australia including a performance at Orange Ex-Services Club. Photo: www.facebook.com/boyandbear Following stellar performances at Splendour in the Grass and at the Triple J One Night Stand in Geraldton, Western Australia. Australian band Boy & Bear have announced a massive tour around regional Australia including a performance at Orange Ex-Services Club on December 7. The band will tour through November and December, playing at locations from Ballarat, Newcastle and Fremantle Prison. The regional tour is timed to the release of 'Hollow Ground', the latest single plucked from last year's album Limit of Love. Listen below.
